page.title: 02LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: People in our area have different types of leisure activities.Most people have{leisure activities in the {home}the most popular one was reading. Others liked gardening,sewing and computers.Many have{sporting activities,the most popular being swimming.Others like walking,running and badminton.Some people enjoyed {musical activities}such as listening to music singing and dancing.Most people have been doing their leisure activities for up to thirty years and spend up to two hours a week on it. Most people do their leisure activities at home but some have to go into Harrogate to places like the swimming baths.A few go out of Harrogate going to Ripon,York and Blubber houses.They travel to these leisure activities by car.
